spec_data.Name: perl-Mozilla-CA
spec_data.Description:
Mozilla::CA provides a path to ca-certificates copy of Mozilla's bundle of
certificate authority certificates in a form that can be consumed by modules
and libraries based on OpenSSL.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 02:05:57 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Mozilla's CA cert bundle in PEM format
